author: gstein
msg: Initial pass at Berkeley DB support. This compiles (but is untested) against
four varieties of DB on my Linux box: db.h, db_185.h, db1/db.h, and (DB3).
[ still missing: configure magic, and testing ]

author: gstein
msg: - change the prototype for apr_dbm_geterror()  [and update dav/fs/dbm.c]
- fix up some error handling in apr_dbm.c
- use "dbm" consistently for the apr_dbm_t parameter

author: gstein
msg: Add apr_dbm_get_usednames() so that apr_dbm users can figure out what
filenames are actually used by the apr_dbm implementation for a given

author: gstein
msg: Use a typesafe function for access objects' pools.
